General.Name: Nanjing Chemical Fibre Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Chemical Fiber Co., Ltd. produces and sells viscose fibers under the Jinling brand name in China. It offers viscose fibers, lyocell fibers, and PET foam material. The company is also involved in the water supply and pulp production businesses. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: Hongshan Fine Chemical Park, Nanjing, China
